ygData.subject: Re: Go ahead punk make my day.
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobias ships rattled with the impact. Damage report Phobia shouts as he exits the Predacon cave. Shields weakened by 80 percent, hull integrity 70 percent,

Phobias ships rattled with the impact. "Damage report" Phobia shouts 
as he exits the Predacon cave.

"Shields weakened by 80 percent, hull integrity 70 percent, engines 
nonoperational."

"Weapons status?" the spiderbot asks

"Attackers moving in from sides of ship, weapons would not be 
affective." the ships words echoed to phobia.

"I will not allow this, Predacons attack the intruders." his 
battlecry rang out through the comm system, if the preds didn't know 
about the attackers they did now."

"The fools will ruin everything I've worked so hard to accomplish" he 
thought as the assault continued on his ship.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Okay, if your daring me.
> 
> BIC: Deemos notices the ship.
> 
> "Isn't that the ship that fired at us earlier?" Destroy it!" Deemos 
ordered. Each of them fired a missile at the ship, that equals 7 
missiles...
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: CYBERWOLF4 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, September 01, 2000 9:50 PM
>   Subject: Go ahead punk make my day.
> 
> 
> 
>        
>        My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new group!  
> 
> 
> 
>   Phobias comm beeps with a message from his ship, "Maximal 
signatures detected instructions?" Phobia shuddered at the 
realization that these were the same attackers as before.
> 
>   Phobia turned toward the other Predacons "Shouldn't we be 
reinforcing the base? the maximals may attack again and catch us with 
our gaurds down."
> 
>   "Now I must step outside, I forgot to take care of something on 
my ship." The spider now realized his mistake. the cave had limited 
defenses and his ship was sitting out in the open. (OK Soulstice you 
think his ships illegal then I dare you to do something about it.)
